tool_description: Generates ensemble forecasts by running multiple model configurations or perturbations to quantify forecast uncertainty.

ensemble_size.description: Number of ensemble members to generate (5-50)

perturbation_method.description: Method for creating ensemble spread: initial_conditions, physics, multi_model

forecast_variables.description: Variables to include in ensemble forecast

clustering_enabled.description: Group ensemble members into scenario clusters

error_messages: Invalid ensemble size: ensemble_size must be between 5 and 50.
Invalid coordinates: location_coordinates must contain exactly 2 values [latitude, longitude].
Invalid forecast length: forecast_length must be between 6 and 168 hours.
Invalid perturbation method: Use one of [initial_conditions, physics, multi_model].
Model configuration error: base_model_config is not a valid model configuration string.
Ensemble generation failed: Could not generate the requested ensemble members. Check parameters and try again.
usage: Provide base_model_config, ensemble_size, location coordinates, forecast variables, and forecast length. Optionally specify perturbation_method and enable clustering. Returns ensemble forecast statistics.

ensemble_mean.description: Mean forecast across all ensemble members

uncertainty_evolution.description: How forecast uncertainty changes over time

ensemble_summary.description: Summary of ensemble forecast results and interpretation
